definition: massive tropical tree with deep ridges on its massive trunk and bearing large pods of seeds covered with silky floss
details:
noun
- massive tropical tree with deep ridges on its massive trunk and bearing large pods of seeds covered with silky floss
= example: massive tropical tree with deep ridges on its massive trunk and bearing large pods of seeds covered with silky floss
= synonyms: ceiba tree, silk-cotton tree, white silk-cotton tree
- a plant fiber from the kapok tree
= synonyms: silk cotton, vegetable silk
